mapper.insert:
SELECT SQ_TM_USER.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
insert into HS_TM_USER (ID, LOGIN_NAME, ENG_NAME, CHIN_NAME, OVSD_NAME, SHIFT, EMP_NUMER, CREATED_ON, UPDATED_ON, ENABLE) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{engName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chinName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ovsdName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shift,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empNumer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdOn,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updatedOn,jdbcType=DATE}, #{enable,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update: update HS_TM_USER set LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENG_NAME = #{engName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHIN_NAME = #{chinName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OVSD_NAME = #{ovsdName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHIFT = #{shift,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_NUMER = #{empNumer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_ON = #{createdOn,jdbcType=DATE}, UPDATED_ON = #{updatedOn,jdbcType=DATE}, ENABLE = #{enable,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select ID, LOGIN_NAME, ENG_NAME, CHIN_NAME, OVSD_NAME, SHIFT, EMP_NUMER, CREATED_ON, UPDATED_ON, ENABLE from HS_TM_USER where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select ID, LOGIN_NAME, ENG_NAME, CHIN_NAME, OVSD_NAME, SHIFT, EMP_NUMER, CREATED_ON, UPDATED_ON, ENABLE from HS_TM_USER
